---
title: "PDF renders"
author: "Joakim Bilyk"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:
  html_document:
    toc: yes
    toc_float: yes
    code_folding: hide
---

```{r, include = FALSE,eval = TRUE}
options(knitr.duplicate.label = "allow")
Rmds <- c("theory","FinKont_homework")
for (dok in Rmds) {
  rmarkdown::render(
      paste0(dok,".Rmd"),
      output_format = "pdf_document",
      output_file = paste0(dok,".pdf"),
      output_dir = "pdf/render"
  )
}
```
